Buy it. Buy it now. I don't care how old it is, this game made me cry god damnit. The gameplay flows well and is great fun even if you don't enjoy the story (what is wrong with you?). The game can be picked up for cheap on sale with the other Bioshock games (also good). This is still one of my favourite single player story based games. The graphics are also quite good considering the age.
es un juego muy bueno se recomienda

Good game, pace and weapon switch system improved a lot comapred to 1 and 2.

But here are some problems:
1. Gpu runs on 100% when the game is not running (alt +tab and using a brwoeser or whatever) while it's running on 20% and stable 60fps during play. WTF
2. it's nice that I don't have to save but when I want to exit the game I can't cause I'll probably loose 5 minute progress because I don't know where saving is done.
3. Initial "tutorial" part is confusing and it's not at all smooth and informative. Just confusing chaos.
